td.content: s:a 60 yo M carpenter presents with mild sad mood for about 10 days. he denies smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 169 cm, Weight 75.5 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed citalopram - 20 mg /day, and ordered Mental Status exam.

s:61 yr old white M carpenter with Body Aches. he has had several such episodes over past 3 years.
